Te burlas tristeza by Julio César Curi

Select the word or extract your want to annotate.

Submit an annotation

Read me

To facilitate the validation of your annotation:
  • A good annotation shares knowledge, testimonies or translations, always about the song.
  • Write properly: spelling, spaces, case, punctuation...
  • Write in the main language of the page. To change the language, click on the flag menu on the top.
  • Write in your own words, add some quotes and source otherwise.
  • Try not to erase existing information, but improve it.
  • Write in [italics] for foreign words, quotes.
  • Use [[bold]] for words and passages from the lyrics.
  • Add [[sources]]] when it applies.
  • To add an image: {https://www.site.com/gardel.jpg | Carlos Gardel}
  • To add a link: {{https://www.el-recodo.com/ | El Recodo Tango website}}
  • Your annotation will probably be modified by other users and/or El Recodo Tango. By posting here you accept this concept.
Once the annotation is submitted, you will receive an email. Validation may take few days. Validated annotations/improvements brings credits to your account:
  • up to 1 Cr for basic corrections like spelling or so.
  • up to 5 Cr for standard explanations or translations.
  • up to 10 Cr for valuable, hard to find information.
If the publisher has to correct your post - according to the rules above - he will receive part of your credits, so don't forget to double check your message ;-) Thanks for your contribution!

Tristeza...
Con el vino de mi mesa
Desataste una pena
Que en mi alma estaba presa.
Te burlas... tristeza
Y estás sentada en mi mesa
Donde nadie te invitó,
Acaso querés que llore
Por más que llore ya es tarde
Dejame con mi licor.

Verás que poco a poco
Cuando esté bien encopado,
Como lo dejo olvidado
Al ayer y a este dolor.
Y entonces
Podés seguir en mi mesa,
Que así te llames tristeza
No gustaré tu sabor.

Es cierto...
Que converso con mis cosas,
Alocadas en su vuelo
De mis penas nacen rosas.
No lloro... tristeza
Son unas perlas traviesas
Que se van del corazón,
Te burlas y me lastimas
Y en la copa de mi mesa
Te mezclas con mi licor.
